title: Mohammed Ben Sulayem: every big controversy so far as FIA president is under attack in election year
summary: After angering F1 drivers, FIA president Mohammed Ben Sulayem has been accused of issuing "gagging orders" to senior racing officials in the latest controversy affecting his term â€” as rumours swirl that he'll face a challenge in his bid to be re-elected. We explore his tumultuous four-year reign

qa_pairs.question: Who is the current president of the FIA as of 2023?
What has Mohammed Ben Sulayem been accused of during his presidency?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Issuing 'gagging orders' to senior racing officials

qa_pairs.question: What significant event is Mohammed Ben Sulayem facing in the context of his presidency?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A challenge in his bid to be re-elected
